Module kivakit.collections
Package com.telenav.kivakit.collections.watcher

Class PeriodicCollectionChangeWatcher<T>

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.collections.watcher.BaseCollectionChangeWatcher<T>
com.telenav.kivakit.collections.watcher.PeriodicCollectionChangeWatcher<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollectionChangeWatcher<T>, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Operation, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
public abstract class PeriodicCollectionChangeWatcher<T> extends BaseCollectionChangeWatcher<T> implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.lifecycle.Startable
A CollectionChangeWatcher that checks for changes at a given Frequency. After being started with start() the object returned by objects() is monitored for changes at the given frequency. If there are changes, the change watchers are notified via BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.onAdded(Object), BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.onModified(Object) and BaseCollectionChangeWatcher.onRemoved(Object). Modification of objects is determined by the timestamp returned by lastModified(Object).

Lifecycle

  • start()
  • isRunning()

Collection Access

  • objects() - Returns a collection of objects to watch
  • lastModified(Object) - Determines the last time an object in the collection was modified
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
